dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryASQLdboSalesLoad
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		RowId as integer,
		Retailer as string,
		SalesMonth as date,
		Product as string,
		ManufacturerProductCode as string,
		SalesValueUSD as decimal(18,2),
		UnitsSold as integer,
		PipelineRunId as string,
		sourceFileName as string,
		RunSeqNo as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Retailer,
		SalesMonth,
		Product,
		UnitsSold
	)) ~> UserQueryASQLdboSalesLoad

value.value: @concat('Pipeline ', pipeline().Pipeline, ' executed in ', pipeline().DataFactory,' - loading file ', pipeline().parameters.Directory, '/',pipeline().parameters.File)
concat('Pipeline ', pipeline().Pipeline, ), ' executed in ', pipeline().DataFactory, ' - loading file ', pipeline().parameters.Directory, '/',pipeline().parameters.File)

sources.name: Chpter9Parquet
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Chpter9Parquet
